title: चुनाव प्रचार के दौरान भरी सभा में भाजपा नेता की पतलून गिरी? पुराना वीडियो, झूठा दावा

vclaim: Mr Rakesh Pareekh BJP candidate from Ajmer was giving a speech when his pants fell down. Poor guy is not used to wearing pants. BJP in their desperation r picking any random person & making them stand pic.twitter.com/vF8osw3cgO
